document_data.mainbody:
der Mordin was a duergar companion of Carlig and Finderlig, as well as a trader.
Uder Mordin tried to avoid excitement and conversation, especially near the drow city of Ust Natha. He informed Gorions Ward that a mage, Vithal, was imprisoned to the north of their trading site, and that he could be freed by using a spell, such as Freedom.
